events.message: We received the candidate's application for the Software Engineer position at 9:15 AM today.
The application was reviewed and categorised under Engineering based on the candidate’s developer background.
A recruiter specialized in software engineering was assigned to handle this case shortly after categorisation.
The recruiter conducted an initial screening call to assess the candidate’s experience with software development and technologies.
The candidate promptly responded with enthusiasm and confirmed availability for the technical interview next week.
Scheduled the technical interview for May 10th at 10 AM with the senior developer panel to evaluate coding skills.
